doc_string.value: @notice Claim pending rewards and checkpoint rewards for a user

@notice Claim available reward tokens for `_addr`
    @param _addr Address to claim for

claim_historic_rewards(address[8]).notice: Claim reward tokens available from a previously-set staking contract

params._reward_tokens: Array of reward token addresses to claim
Array of reward token addresses to claim

claimable_reward(address,address).details: This function should be manually changed to "view" in the ABI Calling it via a transaction will claim available reward tokens
claimable_reward(address,address).notice: Get the number of claimable reward tokens for a user

params._addr: Account to get reward amount for
params._token: Token to get reward amount for

deposit(uint256).details: Depositting also claims pending reward tokens

deposit(uint256,address).details: Depositting also claims pending reward tokens

set_rewards(address,bytes32,address[8]).details: A reward contract cannot be set while this contract has no deposits

params._reward_contract: Reward contract address. Set to ZERO_ADDRESS to disable staking.
params._reward_tokens: List of claimable tokens for this reward contract
params._sigs: Four byte selectors for staking, withdrawing and claiming, right padded with zero bytes. If the reward contract can be claimed from but does not require staking, the staking and withdraw selectors should be set to 0x00

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdrawing also claims pending reward tokens
